meanings.sent1: The nonradioactive material did not give off any harmful rays.
meanings.sent2: The scientist used a nonradioactive substance in the experiment to ensure safety.
meanings.sent3: The nonradioactive rock was jealous of its glowing counterparts.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a nonradioactive beacon in the dark room.
meanings.sent5: The nonradioactive badge glowed with a reassuring dim light.

meanings.sent1: The nonradioactive water was safe to drink without any harmful substances.
meanings.sent2: The nonradioactive soil was perfect for growing organic vegetables.
meanings.sent3: The nonradioactive cookie was disappointed it didn't have any radioactive sprinkles.
meanings.sent4: His nonradioactive personality shone brightly in the group of eccentric friends.
meanings.sent5: The nonradioactive zone was marked clearly to indicate safety.

meanings.sent1: The nonradioactive watch ticked quietly without any harmful effects.
meanings.sent2: The nonradioactive cat played happily without any radioactive contamination.
meanings.sent3: The nonradioactive cloud felt left out among the radioactive storm clouds.
meanings.sent4: Her nonradioactive charm was infectious, spreading positivity to everyone.
meanings.sent5: The nonradioactive flower bloomed beautifully without any harmful radiation.
